caption.p: Cytotoxicity of AECR-AuNPs in colorectal cancer (Caco-2) cells. Percentage viability of Caco-2 cells was assessed using the MTT assay, after 24 and 48 h incubation with increasing concentrations of AECR-AuNPs.
Each data is presented as mean ± SD (n = 3). ap < 0.05 compared to the control group, bp < 0.05 compared to 5´-Fluorouracil (100 μM).
